movies.title: Soul
movies.description: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

movies.title: Onward
movies.description: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.

movies.title: Ugly Dolls
movies.description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: Monsters Inc
movies.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.
